p: Our sample (N = 364) had a mean age of 38.3 years (SD: 11.5), mostly identified as Hispanic (99%), and approximately half reported at least a high school education (42%) and having seen a HCP in the past year (51%) ( Table 1). Despite low prior PrEP awareness (17%) and use (5%), 88% were willing to take PrEP if it was available for free.
